summary: A documentary on the rise and stumble of Troy Duffy, the bartender-cum-filmmaker who was swept up by Miramax's Harvey Weinstein to turn his script for The Boondock Saints into a feature film.
cast: Jeffrey Baxter|Chris Brinker|Jake Busey|Emmanuelle Béart|Gordon Clark|Billy Connolly|Jim Crabbe|Vincent D'Onofrio|Willem Dafoe|David Della Rocco|Marie Duffy|Robert Duffy|Tate Duffy|Taylor Duffy|Troy Duffy|Tyson Duffy|Cassian Elwes|Sean Patrick Flanery|Jason Flom|John Goodman|Shaun Hill|Ramses Ishak|Jimi Jackson|Ron Jeremy|Matthew Modine|Tony Montana|Jerry O'Connell|Norman Reedus|Paul Reubens|Joel Roman|Ron Saint Germain|Daniela Saioni|Patrick Swayze|Mark Wahlberg|Sharon Waxman|Harvey Weinstein|John West|Don Yesso|Billy Zane|Dave Zerr|Ray Carney
director: Directors: Tony Montana, Mark Brian Smith
title: Overnight
